Elements.Text: This is a test text, to show the border of the text box, the longer the better. So lets keep this going. Even further shall we.
Elements.Name: Body Element

Commands.Comment:
Note on the "<pause>: 0% Opacity" Text Element:

This one is required for the Display All Virtual Key, to prevent both the DisplayAll and Confirm Key activating at the same time.
It adds the <pause> to the <gv[1]> inside the Text.
This Text need to be "visible" and so needs a normal text displayed, without any <> inbetween.

Thus the Opacity is reduced to 0, making it invisible, while technically still there.
Activates the Switch for the Virtual Key to Display the Message Immediately
Deactivates the Switch for the Virtual Key to Display the Message Immediately

Elements.Text: This is a test text, to show the border of the text box, the longer the better. So lets keep this going. Even further shall we. And we can go even further! So let's keep going!

Elements.Name: Text Element

Commands.Comment:
Note on the "<pause>: 0% Opacity" Text Element:

This one is required for the Display All Virtual Key, to prevent both the DisplayAll and Confirm Key activating at the same time.
It adds the <pause> to the <gv[1]> inside the Text.
This Text need to be "visible" and so needs a normal text displayed, without any <> inbetween.

Thus the Opacity is reduced to 0, making it invisible, while technically still there.
Activates the Switch for the Virtual Key to Display the Message Immediately
Deactivates the Switch for the Virtual Key to Display the Message Immediately

The Condition for this VK is Activated by a Switch within the Message Box.

When Pressed it will add a <pause> Command to the Message Box, and then Display the full message instantly.
The added <pause> is so when you Press Confirm to Display the Message it doesn't immediately
proceeds to the next Message, but needing an additional Confirm Press to continue.

After it will remove the <pause> Command so when the VK is not pressed, only a single Confirm
is required to proceed.
